name: dotix-scheduler-root
description: Root package for Dotix Job Scheduler

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --production=false && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install --production=false && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build
